ground_truth_answer: Barutcugil teaches ebru at his workshop and studio called Ebristan, where he demonstrates marbling techniques to adult students, though many practice it simply as a hobby due to the difficulty of manipulating materials. The Todds have been involved in teaching together multiple times at the Penland School of Crafts, with Yaffa notably being the second woman to teach glass at Penland School in 1978, before they began working together.
